page.title: 09Buildings
page.content: Holcombe Burnell Barton 15C Manor house now family home, farm and wood burning stove business. Culver House on site of older buillding now converted into flats. 17C buildings in centre of Longdown village include forge converted to house, modernised cobwalled houses,public house, Gilwell farm house and buildings now converted. 14C public house on A30 route. Churh Holcombe Burnell Churh of England, Norman church, Square tower,Peel of 4 bells. Old Methodist chapel razed to ground within last 20 years. Now a garden. Was situated on Chapel Hill Longdown. Church school situated next to church in Holcombe Burnell. Now is a dwelling house.
